# Self Introduction# 
Hi, my name is Yuzhou Li, and I'm **23** years old. I'm currently pursuing a MS degree in LBS.![London Business School](https://london.ac.uk/sites/default/files/styles/max_1300x1300/public/2017-10/london-business-school-Campus.jpg?itok=liDdbRa2)Prior to that, I just graduated from [Rotman Commerce, University of Toronto](https://rotmancommerce.utoronto.ca/). By joining LBS, I can make the most of the career service and the alumni network, which can help me land a decent job in the IBD industry. \ 

I have several interests: 

-   Traveling

As LBS has a variety of clubs, I'm really looking forward to meeting like-minded friends in LBS.
